content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Describe one historical development illustrated by the passage. b) Describe Sotomayor’s argument regarding women’s education. c) Describe Sotomayor’s purpose in making this argument.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
